column4: VLC, xine, and mplayer crash when i try to play HD videos on my  Intel Corporation 82845G/GL with the i810 driver. Anyone know how to fix this?
run it in a terminal and watch out for the error message
When I play the file with xine, I get the following output--This is xine (X11 gui) - a free video player v0.99.6cvs.
seems to me your hadware is not hd able? ^^
